comments:
It can be reproduced in the following way:

- Open the "New JUnit Test Suite" wizard
- Use the default values and press "Finish"

This works for me using M9/RC0 under Windows XP. Tom can you please test it 
under Linux. Thanks

I have the same problem with M9 on Windows 2000. Here is the relevant part of 
the stack trace:
